title: No Matter How Many Times I Go Back In Time, I Fall In Love With You Again - Novel Updates

description:
I fall in love again with the 17-year-old you I never knew.

He is married to his childhood friend, his work is going well, and his savings are modest. Atsushi Suzuhara, an ordinary businessman, wakes up and finds himself back in his high school days. With his wife.

“She looks like a JK, but she’s your wife on the inside!　Won’t you give your youth a second chance?”

Atsushi and his wife, Chiho, had been on the outs with each other in high school because of his self-consciousness.

They immediately enjoy a weekday date in Kyoto in their school uniforms, going to and from school together, flirting at school with Chiho in her volleyball uniform, and enjoying the time between lovers that they couldn’t have before.

The true face of the 17-year-old girlfriend that you didn’t know or couldn’t know is adorable.

No matter how many times time goes by, I fall in love with you. A joint time-release love comedy in which a husband and wife start over, it’s time to begin!>
